body_html:
@ezyang actually figured out my problem with master was the way options propagate to protobuf. Fix is here: #8184

Any thoughts on what needs to be fixed for a more consistent tests? Seems like tests need to rerun a lot.

It would be great to write a single build_pytorch_libs.py to replace the separate sh and bat, but both of those files change so frequently, it will be hard to do without conflicts. Also, a lot of different ways to organize that refactor.
